name: gitlab-runner
description: GitLab Runner is the open-source continuous integration (CI) service included with GitLab that coordinates the testing.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. You need a running instance of either GitLab CE or EE. Also, you need to specify the Runner Token (available on GitLab -> Admin -> Runners), otherwise the runners cannot connect to the GitLab instance.
